ComicInfo.Summary:
The nail-biting conclusion to this fast-paced story brings the heroes back to the Phostwoods where the undead are rising. As Abehhan-Vrre prepares his invasion, our adventurers return with Lumari in the nick of time. But will her father be able to make a heart-wrenching decision no leader should ever make? And will Kiernan be able to let the pieces fall where they may? Don't miss the incredible finale of this beautiful, pulse- pounding series!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/dungeons-dragons-where-shadows-fall-5/4000-144455/
